# call expression argument with bool last result

muxt generate --receiver-type=T
muxt check

-- in.go --
package main

import (
	"bytes"
	"context"
	"net/http"
)

type (
	T struct{}
	S struct{}
)

func (T) F(context.Context, S, int) any { return nil }

func (T) Session(http.ResponseWriter, *http.Request) (S, bool) { return Session{}, false }
-- template.go --
package main

import (
	"embed"
	"html/template"
)

//go:embed template.gohtml
var templatesDir embed.FS

var templates = template.Must(template.ParseFS(templatesDir, "template.gohtml"))
-- go.mod --
module example.com

go 1.20
-- template.gohtml --
{{define "GET /{id} F(ctx, Session(response, request), id)"}}{{end}}
